body_html:
I've managed to reduce the image size by avoiding compilation from sources - just installed using pip wheels as proposed on pytorch.org. Can't measure this precisely now, but I guess > 500MiB reduction.

However, I'm still worried by the size of nvidia/cuda (2GiB for drivers + cudnn?!)
